channel.title: [Webclient] Need some Help. [317]
channel.description:
Alright, I got some problems with my 317 server. I'm trying to make a webclient, but it won't work. I edited the file, that it downloads the cache from FileDen, the direct link, and some more stuff from a tutorial. I made it a .jar file and signed it. Now, if I try to open the client.jar file, it says: "Error connecting: retrying in 60, 59..." Also, I don't really figure out how to setup the webclient, I made a page with this, [code] <HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>Your Webclient</TITLE> <META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE"> </HEAD>
<BODY>
<applet name="yourclientname" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet>
</BODY> </HTML>[/code] But what to do with the client.jar? I'm pretty lost here ;0
I'd greatly appreciate if someone took the time to help me.
Kind regards, 1v2l3a4m5e6n

item.title: [Webclient] Need some Help. [317]
item.dc:creator: @hanesh hanesh
item.description:
@hanesh wrote:

[quote=“1v2l3a4m5e6n, post:1, topic:376519”][code]

Your Webclient[/quote] .... lol u have to edit the client.jar to be the direct link of your client.jar file [/code]

Read full topic
